diff_hunk:
@@ -46,4 +90,34 @@ set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${HIP_PATH}/cmake ${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH})
 ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DNDEBUG)
 
 # Find the HIP Package
-FIND_PACKAGE(HIP 1.0 REQUIRED)
+FIND_PACKAGE(HIP 1.0)
+
+IF(HIP_FOUND)
body:
Since PYTORCH_MIOPEN_LIBRARIES / PYTORCH_HIP_HCC_LIBRARIES / PYTORCH_FOUND_HIP is being used by both frameworks, it's best to leave the names neutral (i.e. remove the PyTorch prefix).

Otherwise looks good if the remaining builds pass.

Otherwise looks good if the remaining builds pass.
